news_header: In September, Israel attacked Hezbollah, resulting in 39 deaths and over 3,400 injuries. Netanyahu gifted a golden pager to Trump referencing the attack.
news_text: In September 2024, Israel conducted an attack on Hezbollah, a Lebanese group, using bombs placed on communication devices, leading to 39 fatalities and more than 3,400 injuries. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu presented a golden pager to U.S. President Donald Trump during his visit to the White House, with a note highlighting their friendship and the context of the gift related to the attack on Hezbollah.
